Hinata, in a rare moment of anger, decides that those who made her suffer should be forced to suffer in turn. With this thought in mind she tilted her head up ever so slightly and gave a hard gulp. A pleasant smile settled on Hinata’s face as she brought one hand up and had her index and middle finger follow the bulge in her throat as it headed towards her stomach. A stomach that was quite eager to greet them as Hinata had been forced to skip breakfast as a punishment for her poor performance in sparing earlier. As the bulge disappeared behind her collarbone, Hinata felt a sense of glee and freedom the likes of which she had never known. The feeling was marred however by the prickle of sadness and the smallest stab of guilt. Not for her clan, oh by all means not. Hinata’s guilt stemmed from allowing her anger to get the best of her and end the lives of those few, those very few that she thought of as true family.

One was her sister, who only did as she had been asked as most children would. Hanabi, though sometimes distant, had always loved her and had often asked her for help or advice in matters of the heart or things that most daughters would seek their mothers’ advice for. Another of the main branch would be Hinata’s self proclaimed aunt, Hakumei Hyuga. She had been good friends with Hinata’s mother and had been the one to teach her much of what she knew, both as a ninja and as a young woman. It was her Aunt Hakumei that helped her understand the feelings she had for one blond Uzumaki; if not for her, Hinata was sure she would be having a much harder time when it came to anything Naruto related. Hinata also remembered the various branch members that had helped her or left her small gifts to try and cheer her up when she was down. Thinking on this, Hinata found it slightly odd that all of the people she truly cherished from her clan were all women.

Hinata shrugged this off and tried to return to reveling in the sensation of the mansion slowly plummeting into her hungry stomach, which growled in impatience. However, Hinata saw something out of the corner of her eye. Focusing on it Hinata was filled with joy at seeing most of the Hyuga women she had just been thinking about gathering around the empty lot, which once held their home. It was around this time that she felt the mansion in question crash into the ‘floor’ of her stomach, sending wonderful shivers of excitement and pleasure through her. As tempting as the idea of laying back and enjoying the sensation of her stomach digesting her former tormentors/clan was, Hinata knew she needed to address the twenty or so Hyuga women that had escaped the fate that befell the rest of the clan.

Towering over them, naked as the day she was born was sort of arousing. She could easily turn her once cherished people into nothing more than snacks, toys, even simple red smears on the ground; all that and anything else her mind could think up. Hinata shook her head to try and drive away such thoughts, after all what would Naruto think of her is she did such things? Thinking of the blond made her pause however. Dark and naughty thoughts that had been suppressed for so long suddenly hit her. The thought that she could do whatever she wanted no matter what he thought of her made her wet in excitement! She could make Naruto into nothing but, a pleasure toy if she wanted; make the boy she loved into a living dildo. She got so excited that she unconsciously started rubbing her thighs together, soaking them in her juices. Her thoughts quickly moved to something even bolder. She could rule the village at her new size, practically enslave it. If she did then it would be a simple matter of appointing Naruto as her lover and one day she would discover the bliss of a growing belly, full of blond-haired-white-eyed life.

The thought alone nearly made poor Hinata climax but, she forced herself to think. Looking back down, she saw the Hyuga women gathered together, all looking to her for instruction or judgment. Hinata realized that this was a turning point in her life. She could continued to be the kind and selfless girl she’s been for so long, if gigantic and in her birthday suit. Or, she could choose to indulge in her darker thoughts and make this village bow to her and her alone.

After using her jutsu for the second time today, Hinata's body began to increase again. Her current size of 1000 miles tall would be nothing to her after she was done growing. Her body quickly began to expand. She doubled in size in a matter of seconds, and soon that was a memory. Hinata's body climbed higher and higher...3000 miles, 5000, 7500.

"Bigger," Hinata focused. "I...must...get...even...bigger!...Still...too...small!"

Hinata's sandals were grinding the Earth beneath them into dust. This was all part of Hinata's plan to protect the village. In addition to her growing frame, Hinata's expanding feet were destroying enemy villages that had atttempted to attack the Hidden Leaf Village in the past. This way, Hinata no longer had to worry about enemy ninja climbing up her sandals and destroying the village.

Hinata's body didn't slow down at all, in fact her growth rate sped up. Hinata grew and grew...10000 miles, 15000, 20000, 30000. Her body was big enough to wrap itself around the Earth, not to mention that her feet had grown to the size of continents. The villagers between Hinata's toes watched as they grew larger around them, becoming protectors of the village. The entire village didn't even register to Hinata anymore.

As Hinata approached 40000 miles tall, she began to get a little cramped on the shrinking planet.

"I guess its time for me to leave the Earth."

Hinata, still growing, pushed off the Earth's surface and jumped away from the planet.

"At least I don't have to worry about destroying the planet anymore!" laughed Hinata.

Hinata's body continued to grow....50000 miles, 75000, 150000, 250000. She watched as the Earth shrank before her very eyes, becoming smaller and smaller. Finally, after almost an eternity of growing, Hinata's body ceased its expansion at a colossal height of 400000 miles tall. The Earth was about the size of a tiny speck to her.

"Wow!" Hinata exclaimed. "I didn't know that the planet looked so beautiful from here. Well, I guess I should place the Earth close to the village so they can still breathe. After all, I can breathe in space, not them."

Hinata gently picked up the planet and placed it between her big and index toes on her right sandal. She made sure not to crush the village in the process. Hinata had officially become a goddess.

"There, now I should be big enough to protect the village from anything! However," said Hinata, "I wonder if the village is getting enough sunlight between my toes? I know! I'll go to the center of the solar system and give the planet some more light!"

Hinata began to walk towards the Sun, ready to take her goddesshood to the next level.
14133.title: Hinata's Toes: Earth's New Home

choices: Hinata decides to "protect" the solar system
141331.content:
With her 200000 mile long legs, it only took Hinata about 7 minutes to reach the Sun (Note: It takes about 8 minutes for sunlight to reach the Earth in its natural orbit). As she drew nearer to the Sun, Hinata became amazed by the enormous life-giving gas ball. She was less than half its size.

"Wow! And I thought I was big! If I was at my normal size, there would be no way I would survive this heat."

As Hinata approached the star, she wondered how she would exactly give the village, and the planet in general, more light.

"Hmmm, what should I do? I could place my right foot close to the Sun, but the planet would probably be burned to a crisp by the Sun's incredible heat. I've got to find a way to make this work."

As Hinata pondered a way to help the village receive its light, she began to feel a warm sensation traveling throughout her entire body. Since she was very close to the Sun, its rays caused Hinata's chakra flow to increase and altered her chakra network significantly. As a side effect, Hinata's body began to grow on its own.

"I feel like I'm getting stronger. What? I'm getting bigger too?"

Hinata's body began to surge upwards at an incredible rate. She soon became equal in size with the Sun, and then watched as it got smaller and smalller as she continued to expand. After a few minutes of growing, her body stopped its expansion once she was 20 times bigger than the Sun, able to hold it in the palm of her hand. The Earth was now completely shadowed by Hinata's toes and no longer registered to her vision (Note: The Sun is about 850000 miles tall...making Hinata's new size a whopping 17 billion miles tall!).

"Woah!" Hinata said to herself. "I didn't expect to be THIS enormous. I wonder why I stopped growing at this size?"

A few seconds later, Hinata figured it out.

"Now I see...I'm ready."

Hinata looked down at the tiny fireball in her palm and opened her mouth up wide. She moved her hand to her mouth slowly and consumed the Sun in one gulp. For a few seconds, the entire solar system was in complete darkness. Then, in a sudden flash, Hinata's body began to glow, lighting up the space around her once again.

"I've become the new Sun, the center of the solar system. I am the lifeblood of all that exists around me. I give warmth to the planets and keep their orbits in check. Without me, all life in the solar system would cease to exist."

After admiring her new power, Hinata got down to business.

"Now let's see...I need to get some more light to the village between my toes. It must be pretty dark down there after that unexpected growth spurt. Maybe if I focus hard enough, I can provide enough light to keep the village warm and make it brighter down there."

Hinata concentrated hard on her big and index toes on her right foot and imagined the area becoming warmer. Sure enough, Hinata began to produce light from her toes, equivalent to the strength of natural sunlight. The village once again had their regular amount of sunlight thanks to Hinata's latest achievement.

"I can't ever go back to being the old me," Hinata said to herself. "I have to remain gigantic forever or the village, no, the entire solar system, will die out. They won't have to worry though; I'll always be watching over them, protecting them and insuring their survival till the end of time."

Hinata looked down at her right foot and smiled proudly. Even though the village had disappeared from her sight a while ago, she knew that it would be safe as long as she was around to look over it.

choices: Hinata decides to start acting like a true goddess
1413311.content:
Hinata had become the new Sun of the solar system; without her, the village and everything around her would eventually die due to a lack of light. As Hinata began to take in her new status, she began to worry yet again. Was she providing enough light to the planets? Or were the planets receiving too much light? What if some of the planets had secret alien life forms that survived in a certain amount of light, and Hinata caused their existence to stop because she wasn't providing enough light? The question that made Hinata worry the most was: Did the village need more light and warmth from her? Hinata finally came to a decision.

"I need to provide the entire solar system with more light. It's my duty not only as goddess of the Hidden Leaf Village, but as the core of the solar system."

Hinata began to focus her chakra once again. After her last increase, she had gained a considerable amount of chakra and all her jutsu became a lot stronger as well. She began to form the hand signs for the jutsu she was about to use for the third time today.

"GIGANTO JUTSU!" Hinata shouted.

Hinata began to feel her body expanding in all directions once again. She had come to like the feeling of becoming ever larger. As she grew, she watched the cosmic entities around her become smaller and smaller. Hinata couldn't believe how big she was getting.

"I'm getting pretty huge, but I'm still not large enough to keep the solar system in check. Bigger," Hinata commanded, "need...to get...BIGGER!"

Hinata's body complied. She continued to grow faster and faster, with no signs of slowing down. In no time, Hinata was able to see the entire solar system shrink to the size of a baseball. Hinata held the celestial body in her hand and watched as it continued to dwindle in size. After about 30 more seconds of relentless growth, Hinata's body ceased its latest spurt at an immeasurable 184 billion miles tall. The solar system had become a tiny speck on Hinata's index finger.

Hinata wasted no time. She slowly lowered the solar system down to her right foot and carefully and gently placed it between her big and index toes, making sure not to destroy the village in the process. Hinata was now the protector of an entire solar system...well, at least her toes were.

"There, that's much better," Hinata said to herself. "Now the planets will get a uniform amount of sunlight, and I won't have to worry if one planet is receiving more or less light than another. And most importantly, the village continues to survive!"

Hinata slightly wiggled her toes, placing the solar system in a comfortable position where it would receive the most light from her body. She smiled once again knowing that she had made the right decision.

"Ever since I found that scroll and started to grow, I've begun to think that I was meant to be the goddess of the Leaf Vilage. The bigger I became, the more I began to believe that this was the case. After this, I KNOW that I was meant to find that scroll, become a powerful goddess, and watch over the village for the rest of time."

Hinata gazed out into the void of space around her, looking forward to what would happen next.
1413311.title: Bigger Hinata = More to Protect

choices: The 2 Hinatas fight and Hinata wins

14133111.content:
"Ah..." Hinata happily sighed. "Finally, the village is truly safe, and I can spend the rest of my days knowing that everything is in order."

At the realization of what she had just said, Hinata's eyes lit up with fear as a sense of panic overwhelmed her very being.

"What am I saying?!" she asked herself aloud. "I just removed the entire solar system from its place in the heavens and placed it between my toes. For all I know, I could've disturbed the natural order of the galaxy without even knowing it! Who knows what I could've just done? Maybe I've doomed the entire galaxy by doing this?! There's only one way I can be completely certain that my actions did not cause any chaos among the stars..."

Hinata stood up straight and joined her hands together in front of her chest, her index and middle fingers pointing upwards towards her heavenly face. Gathering up her chakra within her body and focusing intently on transmitting it into her hands, Hinata took in a deep breath as she prepared to perform her newest jutsu once again.

"GIGANTO JUTSU!" she shouted.

Hinata floated in the vastness of space, waiting for the expanding feeling that accompanied the jutsu to flow throughout her entire body. As Hinata patiently waited to grow once more, she was surprised to see that for some strange reason, her body was not enlarging. Still holding out hope that the jutsu would soon work, Hinata began to feel a slight pain emanating from her stomach; Hinata simply dismissed the pain as hunger and believed that the pain would go away in another few seconds.

"Hmmm..." Hinata thought aloud. "This has never happened before. Maybe...if I try the jutsu again, it'll work for sure this time. Maybe I didn't use enough chakra or something?"

Repeating the preparation for the ninja art, Hinata closed her eyes and focused.

"GIGANTO JUTSU!"

Immediately after shouting the jutsu's name, the feeling in Hinata's stomach rapidly increased in intensity, causing the blue-haired kunoichi to double over in agony.

"Urrrrrrraaaaagggggghhhh!!!" she screamed into the endless void of space. "This pain...why...why?!"

Suddenly, Hinata felt her stomach gurgle as the pain subsided for an instant.

"What is happening to..." Hinata was stopped mid-sentence as she felt a strange substance climbing up her esophagus, completely cutting off her ability to speak. The shy Hyuuga, still in complete shock over this unknown side-effect of the jutsu, knelt with her eyes wide open as the substance began to pour out of Hinata's mouth and into the darkness of space.

"Ack...Akkk..." Hinata choked as the substance began to exit her system more rapidly. The material that was flowing out of the self-proclaimed goddess was a purple liquid that seemed to absorb all light around it as it entered the heavenly sphere. More and more of the strange liquid poured out of the kunoichi's body, a scale pint of liquid already floating before her and adding to its volume. Hinata's eyes suddenly lit up with fear as the liquid began to swirl before her; it began to take form.

"Munh...Munh!" she gargled as she floated hopelessly in space, watching this substance become a cosmic entity before her very eyes...

---

Exactly thirty-seven seconds after the liquid had begun its departure out of Hinata's body, the substance slowly began to stop flowing out of the colossal pre-teen and solely focused on its conglomeration from amorphous liquid to a solid being. Hinata grabbed her throat as she gasped for breath, the taste of sulfur clinging to her taste buds. The form before her slowly began to meld and mold into a cylindrical shape, then began to adopt a humanoid appearance as limbs became apparent.

"What... What's going on?" Hinata thought to herself, too preoccupied with catching her breath to actually speak the words.

From humanoid to clearly human, the form continued to change. Soon, it was recognizable as the form of a young woman. As its features became clearer and more defined, Hinata was shocked. "It looks... Just like me!"

And for the most part, it did - The facial features were exactly like Hinata's, only without the shyness or fear which she wore upon it. The doppleganger began to form clothing for itself, a skimpy purple nightgown consisting of a matching outfit of a mauve bra and panties. The new being also took a body similar in shape to Hinata's, except for a few exceptions - The creature possessed breasts two cup sizes larger than its muse, curvier legs, long, flowing blue hair that extended halfway down her back, and toned muscles that were not visible to anyone who viewed the being.

"What...What are you?!" Hinata asked the creature in fear.

The young woman finally finished its final changes and was now whole; the girl was an improved clone of the young Hyuuga. About 5 seconds after the girl became complete, it opened its mouth in an attempt to speak.

"H... H... Hin... Hinata," the girl spoke, "...I... am... Hinata."

The original Hinata stood in both fear and awe at the girl as it had proclaimed that it was her. "No, this is impossible," she thought to herself. "What is happening? There can't be another Hinata Hyuuga!"

The doppelganger began to speak once more.

"Yes... I'm... getting the hang of this..." it said as it looked over its newly formed body. Looking at her right palm, the woman quickly clenched it into a fist and smiled. "A body all my own... to use as I wish."

Hinata could not believe how quickly the creature was learning to speak and adjusting to its new body. "It's already mastered speaking English in only about ten seconds and proclaimed itself to be me," Hinata thought. "Comprehension of the language is a whole other thing entirely; let's see if this copycat has good intentions.

"Um...H-H-Hello?" asked a slightly frightened Hinata.

Turning its head to face Hinata, the girl began to answer, "Hello, Hinata."

"How...How do you know who I am?" a terrified Hinata questioned as she somehow managed to keep herself from trembling with fear.

"Because I am you," the girl responded plainly, as though the answer were not supposed to surprise the original Hinata. "A part of you...Or at least, I was."

"A part...of me?" Hinata asked nervously. "But...How?"

"Ever since you've acquired this new ability, you've only used it to help others. You've always been like that, always helping others and never listening to your own desires," the doppelganger explained. "I am born of the unfulfilled desires which you hide not only from others, but even from yourself. I am the embodiment of every action you wish to have taken but were afraid to do."

"My unfulfilled desires?" Hinata echoed. "No... I just want to protect others... I just want everyone to be safe!"

"You may be able to lie to others, but you can no longer lie to yourself," the doppelganger replied. "You have power the likes of which most could not even dream! And here you are, wasting your time protecting them."

"Them?" the original asked. "Them who? The Village Hidden in the Leaves?"

"Well, they're certainly a part of the problem, but I meant all humans in general," the doppelganger replied.

"But I...I mean, we're humans too," Hinata argued.

"We were human. Just as we were weak. We were powerless. But certainly, you don't think that such is still the case, do you? You yourself have referred to us as a goddess. And why should a goddess cater to the whims of mortals?"

"Well, because a kind goddess must protect others. It's my duty as goddess of the village!"

"And who said that all goddesses must be kind?"

"Um...Well..." Hinata stumbled.

"Exactly. Goddesses should, no, must follow their innermost desires and become stronger. Can't you feel the power surging through your veins even at this moment? The allure of becoming more...Can you feel it?"

Hinata was silent for a moment, unable to come up with a reply.

"You can feel it, I see," the clone continued. "Isn't it wondrous? Why do you not accept your true destiny? Hinata, you must realize that it is time to leave your old life behind and begin your life anew with no restrictions!"

"How...How do I do that?" asked a slightly intrigued Hinata.

"Hahaha!" the girl laughed. "Certainly you jest, no? Hinata, to reach your full potential, simply squeeze your toes."

"Squeeze my toes?" Hinata began to do just that, but then stopped. "Wait, you don't mean...You can't be asking me to destroy the village!"

"Not just the village, but the entire world. So long as there live others who can read the scroll, our power is threatened. And we can't have that, now can we?"

"No!" the original Hinata shouted with a conviction rarely found within her. "I won't destroy the village for something as petty as power! I became a goddess so I could protect the village, not destroy it!"

"So we're back to that again, are we?" the doppelganger sighed. "Just imagine it... The stars themselves, as nothing to us! The very universe, but a speck before our divine form! We shall not merely ascend to the heavens - we shall become the heavens!"

"I said no!" Hinata shouted. "We're not destroying the earth, I won't let you!"

"You won't let yourself," the doppelganger smirked. "You're holding us back. But don't worry, I'll fix that... If you fight me to protect the village, you'll lose... Because deep down, you want me to win. I told you, I am a reflection of your desires. If you truly want something, how can you fight against it?"

"I...I can fight..." Hinata stuttered. "I know I can!"

With that, Hinata took a battle-ready stance, as her eyes glowed with her family's signature Byakugan.

"You're really going to fight me, aren't you?" the doppelganger laughed. "We're many things, but suicidal isn't one of them."

"I don't have to kill you, I only have to stop you!" Hinata said.

"Fine... We'll fight," the other Hinata shrugged. She simply stood there, not taking a formal battle stance or the like, but simply smiling. "It's not like there's anyone else worthy to spar with us, so I suppose I might as well enjoy the workout."
14133111.title: Hinata's Greatest Challenge: Herself

choices: By denouncing their mortal names and crushing the solar system.
By crushing the solar system in a "creative" manner.
141331112.content:
The original Hinata rushed toward her dark copy and delivered a simple thrust punch, which the copy shunted with her arm, then spun and attempted to kick at the original, who quickly ducked under the attack. Hinata sought to end the fight quickly and used her Byakugan to locate the other Hinata's chakra passages, then struck with her family's Gentle Fist technique, attempting to block the doppelganger's chakra flow.

"I'm afraid that we'll both find Gentle Fist to be useless in this fight," the doppelganger laughed lightly. "Gentle Fist works by inserting your chakra into a foe's chakra stream. Since our chakra is one in the same, it cannot cause the disruption it does in others. Other techniques, however... Heaven's Dance of Hazy White!"

In a trice, her view shifted to match his perception, finally allowing her "eyes" to meet his. [I'm sorry I took so long. Outgrowing the entire universe isn't a quick and easy thing to do, after all.]

Naruto's eyes bulged, his jaw dropping. [Outgrowing the UNIVERSE?!?]

Hinata giggled, the sound much deeper and throatier than ever... much more sensual and adult. [That's right, Naruto. I kept absorbing everything, and the bigger I grew, the more I could take in. In the end, I absorbed the entire universe.] She smiled. [Everything. Even you and the Village of the Leaf. It surprised me, actually.]

The blond blinked, tilting his head slightly. [But... well, if you absorbed it all... Nothing looks like it's changed, 'cept for the sky, so... how am I standing here? Am... uh...] The light flush on his cheeks seemed to darken. [Am I like... a part of you now, or somethin'?]

Hinata smiled. [That's actually pretty close to the truth, Naruto. When I absorbed the universe, I reached true godhood. I had finally amassed enough power and energy to become a goddess. It felt so fantastic and wonderful... to be honest, it's literally impossible to completely describe. But then, I discovered that I'd absorbed you too, along with the village I was also trying to protect. I was horrified, thinking that I would never get to speak to you again, realizing that everything I had done to become bigger and stronger had actually defeated my entire reason for doing it. That feeling triggered something powerful within me, and my belly suddenly began to swell. Before long, I realized that I was recreating the entire universe within my womb, which absolutely thrilled me. I restored everything to how it was before, only I'm out here instead of down there of course. And I can see and interact with everything going on inside of me. So now, rather than just being a supersized giantess, I'm a true goddess of the entire universe. And I'm protecting you all within my belly.]

Naruto's eyes had widened to the size of dinner plates, a trickle of blood dripping from his nose. [So... right now, I'm... inside your...]

[Yes, my dearest beloved. You finally managed to penetrate me, thrusting down and forcing yourself deep within my womanhood.] Hinata purred, her voice sexy smooth. [Was it as good for you as it was for me?]

Blood spurted from the blond ninja's nose. Lightheaded, he fell back on his rear, eyes dazed, before frantically trying to stem the flow from his nostrils. She couldn't help but laugh, which actually seemed to exacerbate the problem, though his grin certainly betrayed his own happiness. Within a few moments, he had managed to stuff enough tissues into his nose to contain his overexcited biological response.

[Ah! Um... well, I don't think I got to enjoy it like you did, Hinata-chan...]

[True enough.]

Naruto frowned for a moment. [Or, uh, I guess if you're a goddess now and all, it should probably be 'Hinata-sama' instead. But that just kinda sounds weird to me...]

The universal goddess considered. [Well, perhaps coming from you, Naruto. Please, call me whatever you wish. I'll grant this privilege to you and you alone.]

The blond blushed again. [Ah. Thanks, Hinata-chan.] He grinned. [So, does that mean you'll still drop in and say 'hello' now and then? I figure you'll probably be busy keeping an eye on everything in the universe now, being a goddess and all.] His grin slipped a bit, and he idly scratched his head. [If you can't, well, I'll understand. I mean, it's probably like a million times harder than being Hokage and all, and Tsunade-baachan never has any spare time. I... It'd be a shame not to get to talk with you any more after all I learned about you today...]

[That's true...] Hinata bit her bottom lip, wondering about the idea herself. She'd repeatedly expressed her intent to protect him and the village, but she hadn't really thought about how much she would have to concentrate to follow through on that. After all, her only actions since recreating the universe were conversing with Naruto... and masturbating long enough to orgasm twenty-seven times. She truly did not know the limits of her abilities. Naruto stared numbly at the clear starry sky for a long time, idly scratching his scruffy hair, before sighing. "Well, whatever it is, I hope she doesn't take too long to figure it out before saying 'hello' again," he muttered wistfully to himself. He turned in the general direction of his apartment and, sandals scuffing against the ground, slowly made his way out of the clearing.

He'd barely taken a dozen plodding steps before an explosion rocked the space behind him.

Gritting his teeth, he whirled into a defensive position facing the disturbance, back against a sturdy tree and hands ready to launch into one of his signature jutsus. A gigantic plume of smoke enveloped the entire clearing, and he snarled, recognizing the billowing clouds for what they were – the results of a ninjutsu technique. He was seconds from deploying a handful of shadow clones to blindly charge into the smoke, hopefully taking the assailant by surprise, when a lilting voice called out from the center of the clearing.

"I'm sorry it took so long, Naruto. I had to try a few different techniques before I figured out how to make it work like I wanted."

He held his breath, the sound of that voice bouncing around inside his skull. Desperately, he dashed into the dissipating cloud, heading toward the center of the clearing. The smoke began to clear...

He suddenly stopped short, eyes wide.

He could hardly believe it, but there she was. Hinata Hyuuga, looking exactly as she had the last time he saw her.

Then he took a second, longer more appreciative look. Yes, she resembled the same old Hinata, sporting her usual outfit, pale skin, long pretty hair, and delicate features. But her entire demeanor was different. So much more... unrestrained.

For one thing, she met his gaze calmly and easily, head held high and proud, a loving smile rather than a timid worrisome expression on her face. Her eyes were clear, adoration and mischief twinkling in those previously guarded orbs. Her stance was open and relaxed, one hand at her hip, rather than both held bashfully at her chest. Speaking of which... Naruto swallowed. Hinata almost seemed to be presenting herself, showcasing her two most remarkable developments during his multi-year training trip with the old pervert – rather than curling inward like before, almost as if to hide her impressive still-developing bosom. And, now with new understanding, he couldn't help but glance toward her sandal-clad feet, her toes prominently displayed and wiggling... beckoning him to touch and kiss.

No longer a timid lovestruck young girl, Hinata projected the image of a confident self-assured woman, and Naruto couldn't help but fall completely in love with her.

She giggled, sending tingles up his spine, and raised one delicate hand to her supple lips. "I don't think I look any different than before, Naruto."

He vehemently shook his head. "You look absolutely different, Hinata-chan. I mean, you're wearing the same stuff as always, but, well... you don't act the same way at all. You... you're..." He swallowed, offering a bewildered shrug at his inability to properly articulate his thoughts.

She smiled warmly, taking the first few delicate steps toward him. "I know what you mean. I'm not acting like my old, shy, insecure self, am I?" He shook his head again, then took a deep swallow as she drew close, placing both of her hands on his shoulders. "Well, I've been waiting my whole life for this moment, and if becoming supreme goddess of the entire universe hasn't given me enough confidence, then I don't think I would ever have the courage to do this."

And before Naruto could react, Hinata buried one hand in his spiky blond mane and pulled his face down to meet hers in a deep, searching kiss. His brain only needed a split second to kick his reflexes into gear, and he swiftly surrounded the young goddess in a powerful hug, returning every bit of the love and emotion his beloved showered upon him.

The two remained locked in a tight embrace for a very long time, and when their lips finally parted and they simply stared into each other's eyes, Naruto belatedly realized they had sunk to the ground during that fantastic kiss. He grinned, his eyes shimmering with happy tears, and she herself bore a smile so bright he could swear it was day again. Feeling rather confident himself, he pulled her close again, burying his face in her lovely hair and holding her tighter than anyone else in his entire life.

They remained that way for an hour, content to merely be with each other while listening to the sounds of nature and each other's hearts and breaths.

In time, Naruto finally decided to disturb the fey atmosphere enveloping the forest clearing.

"So... what did you do? Are you really here? Is this really you, Hinata-chan?"

Hinata gently kissed the crook of his neck before leaning back to peer earnestly into his eyes. "You remember that solution I mentioned?" He nodded. "It involves one of your infamous techniques... though modified befitting a goddess of my power. I call it the 'Kami Bunshin no Jutsu'."

Naruto blinked. "'God Clone Technique'?" He frowned. "Wait, so you're... just a clone?"

She chuckled. "In a fashion. Naruto, I can't possibly make you understand how immense and powerful I am now. There's no way you could relate. And there's also no way for me to shrink myself down and simply visit you, not while I bear the entire universe within my womb. But, I got to thinking about your own 'Kage Bunshin' technique, and I realized that I could use that ability too, but with a little goddess twist."

Though maintaining a worrisome pout, he cocked his head in honest curiousity.

"You see, your shadow clone technique creates copies of you using your chakra. They act independently of you, though they all still behave as if they were you. Well, I figured I could do something similar... only I really wanted to put part of myself into this... copy." She grimaced, the word tasting bad on her tongue. "No, I don't consider myself a mere copy..."

She looked up again, spearing Naruto with an extremely earnest expression. "Naruto, I am an avatar, a real part of my true goddess self, with a tiny fraction of my full power. Even so, I'm stronger than anything else on this planet, and I can still feel the connection with my true self. So I'm more than just a 'clone'." She smiled adoringly. "I'm the part of myself that gets to spend my life beside the one I love most in the entire universe. That alone makes me extremely special."

Naruto swallowed, tears trickling from his eyes, and enveloped the young avatar in a tight embrace. "Thanks, Hinata-chan. I'm sorry I doubted you."

She returned his hug, just as strongly. "It's okay. I know it's hard on you. I'm just glad I'm able to be here like this."

The two held their embrace for a long moment, feeling their anxiety abate in the presence of their beloved. Once she was settled and assured again, Hinata leaned back, smiling, before coyly quirking a brow. "Now, how about we head back to your place, and I show you some of the other things I've discovered since becoming a goddess? Like I said, I do have a sizeable amount of power... among other abilities."

He didn't need to be asked twice. Before even she could react, he'd hefted her into a bridal carry and was beating a hasty path to his home. He leveled his own lewd grin at her and said, "And while you do that, I can show you some of the stuff I learned... about your gorgeous little toes..."

The goddess avatar blushed cherry red, though she matched his grin perversion for perversion.
